Controller
A controller interface that allows the application to control the process.
Fido2AuthenticatorInfo
Information about an authenticator that helps a user decide which authenticator to select for an Fido2 request that matches multiple authenticators.
Fido2AuthenticatorRegistrationInfo
 
Fido2Client
A FIDO2 client that processes FIDO2 requests and generates FIDO2 responses.
Fido2ClientFactory
A factory that create FIDO2 client objects.
Fido2Config
A global FIDO2 SDK configuration class.
Fido2ErrorCode
Fido2 specific error codes
Fido2Exception
Thrown when an error prevents further FIDO2 request processing.
Fido2OperationInfo
A class that holds common information for an ongoing operation started from Fido2Client that the UI needs to display to the user.
Fido2OperationType
Type of FIDO2 operations.
Fido2Request
A FIDO2 request for registration, authentication, etc..
Fido2RespondArgs
An immutable composition of the arguments needed to respond to a FIDO2 request in Fido2Client.respondWithArgs.
Fido2RespondArgs.Builder
A builder of Fido2RespondArgs instances.
Fido2Response
A FIDO2 request to a registration, authentication, etc request.
Fido2ResponseCallback
Callback interface the caller of Fido2Client.respondWithArgs must implement to receive its results asynchronously.
Fido2ResponseTask
A FIDO2 asynchronous task that can be cancelled.
Fido2UiCallback
 
Keyboard
A class to construct and return a secure keyboard in a Fragment and subscribe to relevant keyboard events.
KeyboardCallback
An interface to receive relevant keyboard key events
KeyboardKey
An enum describing the type of key pressed.
KeyboardUsage
An enum describing what the keyboard is for.
PasscodeAuthenticator
Manages the authenticator information regarding the Passcode Authenticator.
PasscodeAuthenticatorCallback
A callback to show the keyboard UI and handle the Passcode enrollment/unenrollment events.

A global Passcode configuration class.
PasscodeRule
A base class to represent the rules to set to a passcode.
PasscodeRuleException

PasscodeRuleException.ErrorCode
Represent errors resulting from passcode rule violations.
PasscodeRuleLength
A passcode rule that requires the length to be within a specific range.
